original_text: After two hours, an important officer of the city caused the crowd to be quiet. He said, ‘People of Ephesus! Everybody knows about our god Artemis who has her temple here in Ephesus. People come here to worship her. Her special stone that fell from the sky is also here in Ephesus. We take care of all her things. Everybody knows that!
korean_text: 서기장이 무리를 진정시키고 이르되 에베소 사람들아 에베소 시가 큰 아데미와 제우스에게서 내려온 우상의 신전지기가 된 줄을 누가 알지 못하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: an important officer of the city
caused the crowd to be quiet
Everybody knows about our god Artemis
sentences.korean_translation: 모두가 우리 신 아르테미스에 대해 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: who has her temple here in Ephesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 에베소에 그녀의 성전을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: People come here to worship her
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그녀를 숭배하기 위해 여기에 옵니다

sentences.original_text: Her special stone that fell from the sky
We take care of all her things
